CustomObject.description: This mdt is used to seperate out which locations have which visn. Each record is separated by VISN, with one field on each record containing all possible Facility IDs. This is used in the TUC_Escalated_to_TED flow to provide a more dynamic selection of Facilties by using a mixture of custom metadata and the Location Object data.
CustomObject.label: TUC Location by VISN
